project.name: Payments Reliability
project.description: The Payments Reliability project aims to enhance the robustness and efficiency of the payments system for SMEs in India, ensuring seamless digital transactions. This initiative will focus on optimizing various components of the payment infrastructure to enhance user experience and reduce transaction failures.

epics.title: Payment Gateway Optimization
epics.description: This epic focuses on optimizing the core payment gateway to ensure faster transaction processing and improved reliability. By fine-tuning the processing algorithms and reducing bottlenecks, we aim to increase payment success rates, drive user satisfaction, and reduce operational costs.

epics.title: Fraud Detection Enhancement
epics.description: This epic is centered around the improvement of fraud detection mechanisms within the payment ecosystem. By enhancing our algorithms and expanding data sources, we aim to identify and mitigate fraudulent transactions, protect our users, and reduce losses associated with fraud.

epics.title: System Monitoring & Alerting
epics.description: This epic will establish robust system monitoring and alerting protocols to identify and respond to payment processing issues in real-time. By implementing advanced monitoring tools, we aim to ensure continuous operation and quickly address any anomalies, thus minimizing downtime and enhancing reliability.

okrs.objective: Improve payment success rate from 95% to 98%
key_results: Analyze failure points and reduce them by 50%
Implement optimization changes and validate their impact in a controlled environment
Deploy changes and monitor success rates through A/B testing

okrs.objective: Reduce average transaction processing time by 30%
key_results: Identify and eliminate top 3 bottlenecks in current processing flow
Enhance throughput capacity by 20% through system upgrades
Conduct transaction time measurement pre and post-optimization to measure impact
Install and configure monitoring tools to manage API health
Conduct load testing to ensure performance under peak conditions
Implement alerts for downtime and response protocols for incidents
